title: Chapter 946 - The City Lord Arrives
body:
Chapter 946 - The City Lord Arrives

Atop the stage.

The grief-stricken Xue Ting suddenly glared at Su Yi. He made no attempt to disguise his hatred.

When he met Su Yi earlier, he’d warned and threatened him.

But how could he have anticipated that a Spiritual Revolution Realm young man would be able to kill the mid-stage Profound Illumination Wei Jingkui?

Xue Ting took a deep breath, then said gravely, “Who are you? Why are you interfering in Night Demon Mountain’s affairs?” 

He was an Imperial Realm expert who’d overcome years of wind and rain. He naturally wouldn’t let his anger muddle his head.

Especially since Wei Jingkui had been killed. How could Xue Ting dare attack recklessly?

Su Yi said casually, “It doesn’t matter who I am. What matters is that today, all of you must die.”

Had Su Yi spoken this light, airy sentence immediately upon arriving in Dragon Cloud Arena, he likely would have provoked uproarious laughter from the spectators.

Yet now, this sentence sent chills through the crowd’s hearts.

Xue Ting’s expression shifted, and he suddenly looked at Weng Xuanshan. “Elder Weng, Dragon Cloud Arena is your territory. Are you just going to stand back and watch this boy commit murder?”

Weng Xuanshan’s face stiffened. A moment later,...
